winery_details.title: Winery card
winery_details.contact: Please contact the Winemaker in advance to arrange your visit.

map_info.title: Map use
map_info.winery_detail: Tap on the pop-up to see the winery card
map_info.wineries_near_touch: Press on a map’s point for a few seconds to display the closest wineries
map_info.map_gps_center: Centre the map on your GPS location
map_info.wineries_near_gps: Show the wineries closer to your GPS location
map_info.wineries_search: Search and show the wineries by name o winemaker’s name, if any
map_info.map_clean: Hide all the wineries from the map
map_info.info_row_1: When opening - your GPS must be on- only the wineries within a range of 120 km from your location will be displayed.
map_info.info_row_2: To display the full map press the Reload button.
map_info.info_row_3: To use some features the GPS must be activated.

map_filters.title: Map additional filters
map_filters.location_title: Display the wineries in the following region and/or province:
map_filters.services_title: Display the wineries that offer the following service:

info.info_row_1: This app content is the result of the work of natural wine lovers.
info.info_row_2: The wineries list has been made with the help of “BE.VI.AMO NATURALE” Facebook group.
info.info_row_3: We used an inclusive selection method, trying to take into account the various manifestos of the existing associations.
info.info_row_4: For vineyards: no pesticides, no synthetic products and only manual harvest.
info.info_row_5: For winemaking: no selected yeasts, no finining, no sterile filtration, no adjuvants and additives. No physical or thermal treatments, no high level of sulphites.
info.info_row_6: We can’t pretend all the data are 100% correct or up to date, therefore anyone with useful information will be welcome to  contact us to improve this selection.
info.info_row_7: Considering this and due to the great vitality of the sector, this app will always be evolving.
info.info_row_8: If you too, Wine Tripper, would like to support, share your knowledge with NaTourWine’s staff.
info.location_title: Number of wineries for region and province:
